title: Results:  Worse than when I started
text:
I have used Elastiderm cream with good results for years. I tried this in September, 2012 and used consistently for almost 2 years now. The only good thing I can say is that it lasts a long time. However, as for results, not only did I see no results, it GAVE me dark circles and puffiness where I'd never really had any before.

Can't recommend as much as I'd like to. I like Obagi products but this one did more damage than good.

They have enough material that the part that goes across your hair on top can be really thick-almost like a bandana- or can be squished together to make a thinner headband....either way they're super cute, stylish and hold masks in place without hurting your ears! Received exactly as described, fast shipping. Recommended!

title: Cheap.... You get what you pay for!
text: I thought this was a good bargain when I purchased it but these are not good quality caps. I'm glad I didn't pay any more than I did because I would have been pretty upset. The plastic is thin and the elastic always ends up breaking while I'm wearing the cap (when pre-pooing or deep conditioning). If you only need to wear them for a very short time (under an hour), they'll be fine; just be very careful and gentle with them.

title: Keeps my cuticles neat and in check. Doesn't hurt. Easy to use and small enough to take with you.
text:
This is a cute and very effective little cuticle pusher. I often neglect my cuticles because it hurts to push them back. This pusher is very gentle, though, and doesn't hurt. It's small, so it's easy to store and can be taken on-the-go with you if needed. Plus, it comes with a little sleeve to keep it in, which is convenient.

It's really to use and has a nice, gridded handle so it doesn't slip out of your hands. I like the curved end that makes it really easy to push your cuticles. It has "U.S.A." nice and big on it, too, for those who preferred products made in the U.S.A. All around, great little manicure tool.

A free sample was provided for evaluation and review.

title: My hair LOVES this product. Provides a well-defined, extremely moisturized and bouncy twist out.
text:
This is an extremely moisturizing cream that my 4a/4b hair absolutely drinks up!! My hair is extremely dry after washing and letting it air dry (even though I always add a leave-in and oil). So, I decided to use this to help moisturize and twist my hair. I could just feel my hair going from super dry to extremely soft and moisturized from just one application of each section! I also applied this over castor oil, which I applied to my hair beforehand. (I use the L.O.C. moisturization method).

I then twisted my hair and applied this generously (my twist outs always come out better when I'm more generous with my product of choice). After 10 hours or so, I took out my twists and had a very well-defined twist out! There was absolutely no frizz - even after separating each twist (I undo the twist and the split each section in half). I'm really happy with the results.

The pics I'm included are of a two-day-old twist out (I forgot to take a pic on the first day) and my hair still looks great - a little frizzy from sleeping on it, but nothing horrible. I just spritzed on a little leave-in conditioner to refresh my hair and it looked just as good as the first day. This cream is wonderful and allows me to easily go 4-5 days on one twist out - something that many other products just don't do for my hair.

This has a really sweet, pleasant smell to it. It's a white cream that's on the thick side, but very easy to work with and absorbs nicely into the hair - doesn't just sit on top. I also love that it doesn't make my hair feel all crunchy or crispy. My twist out was really soft and my curls were bouncy. Thanks to providing great hold, amazing definition, and complete hydration for dry, frizzy hair, you can't get wrong using this product!

I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review. All opinions are 100% mine.

title: I have very thick, curly hair and these hold a lot of hair securely.
text:
I've been using these for a month now on a weekly basis (a few days each week) and I'm happy to report that none of them have broken! I've had some (from other brands) that have broken on me after just a week or two - these have not done that.

They're really great quality and can hold quite a bit of hair. My hair is really thick and tightly curled and I can easily part my hair into just 6 sections and hold each section tightly and securely with these; they're definitely strong and flexible. It's quite refreshing. Sometimes, depending on how I position them, these can be a little too tight actually. They never slip off or budge at all!

Also, these clips do not pull my hair or get tangled. The colors are very nice too. It's a nice change from the all black clips that I have. They can be a little hard to handle when your hands are wet or have products on them - they get a little slippery. Other than that, I have no complaints.

I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest, unbiased review. All opinions are 100% mine.

title: Perfect for people who want something other than floss
text:
I have been purchasing these brush picks for several years and recently I was unable to find them in our local pharmacy. Fortunately, Amazon carried these picks and I like them so much, I ordered a dozen.

They are really great picks. I do not like to floss. It, to me, is messy and if I use the unwaxed floss, it gets caught in my teeth. I will use it from time to time, but mainly I use these after every meal and they work perfectly to remove plaque and other build-up. My dental hygienist even remarked at how little work she has to do to remove plaque at my 6 month check-ups and I really believe that it is due to proper brushing, of course, but these brushpicks as well. My dentist and the hygienist always ask me how often I floss and my same response is that I use the brushpicks and not floss. I am not sure they believe me.

Both of us in the house keep a pack in our respective cars to have them handy. They are a very good product.

title: Floss pulls out of the plastic and the angle of the flosser makes it hard to use
text: The floss heads are fairly useless.  The floss pulls out of the plastic part as you try to floss, this takes between a row of teeth and 1 tooth to happen.  You'll need to use 2+ heads per time you floss.  Additionally, the angle of the flosser makes using the ribbon head floss exceedingly difficult - if it were 90 degrees like the Listerine version, it would be way better.  Because of the angle, you'll need to open your mouth extremely wide to floss your molars with the ribbon floss.  With the combination of poor design with the remarkable fragility of the floss heads I recommend avoiding this brand.

title: Roller Ball May Not Be the Best Mode of Application
text:
I've been using this serum for 5 days, AM and PM. I believe I see some minor reduction in the lines under my eyes...but it could be wishful thinking. I am not convinced there is always serum coming out while rolling it on because the nature of steel is that it feels cool to the touch, therefore can give the impression of depositing serum when, in fact, it isn't. To determine this I ran it over white tissue several times; only about 50% of the time did serum actually come out. I removed and cleaned the steel roller ball as directed then reran my "experiment" and had the same results.

During application I can briefly detect a damp look where it is being deposited, but this goes away within seconds. At other times nothing is on the surface of my face and immediate dabbing with a tissue proves there is no serum. I am not convinced this is the best mode of application.

If, after a couple of months of use, I see definite wrinkle reduction I will happily update my review accordingly.

title: Easy to use
text:
Pre-pandemic my hubby would go get his hair trimmed before it got too long. During lockdown and beyond, he didn't want to risk getting sick for a hair cut since I'm high risk. So he decided so long as he's working at home, he was just going to let it grow to enjoy longer hair while he could. As it got longer he started asking me how I people with longer hair tie their hair back without getting a headache. I told him we don't. Then got offered this for review so I snatched it up.

It helps a lot because it's not a solid band, so you can sort of tighten it and/or take it off without yanking half of your hair with it. Takes a little tweaking and getting used to. Not sure how it would hold up to more complicated styles, but for just holding your hair back in a pony tail, it's pretty decent.

title: Cute prints, weird fit
text:
I ordered this set and a similar pack by another brand in solids. The solids were so comfy. These, eh, not so much. They're not horrible, but I 100% notice them and have to readjust these often. I have that issue with a lot of fabric headbands though.

I do love the prints and they're well made. I will keep them but I wouldn't re-order them. I suspect I'll end up tearing out the knot and re-sew it to be just a wide headband instead, I think they'll fit me better and not slide around as much that way.

Overall: if you find you can wear most fabric headbands without issue, you'll love these. If you find this style of headband is a gamble where some fit awesome and others slide around or if you have a larger head, these will probably not be your faves.

title: A lot of hair
text:
I will preface this by saying I own only three wigs (two lace front, one not. All three are cheaper and synthetic hair) and I am in no way an expert. I'm still learning how to style them, etc.

That said, of the three, this is my second favorite. It is a lot of hair. As someone with thin, fine hair that has been kept short for years, I think it may be almost too much hair for me. I may have to trim it some so that it won't feel so overpowering. The hair itself looks decent enough that it could probably be a daily wig for most.

title: Vibrant color, but very messy.
text:
I'm posting a pic of my hair pre-bleach, post bleach, and post pink dye. I probably didn't need to bleach it but the last time I tried to dye my hair with pinks (two different brands) it just didn't take very well.

This took very well. The kit includes all you need (I used different gloves just because I prefer others). The directions are simple and complete. I would say that if you have hair longer than chin, maybe shoulder length, you will need at least two boxes. I have a pixie cut and used about half of both the bleach and dye. I always follow the direction when bleaching and did follow their directions. I never follow directions when using these "Direct dye" bright colors. Instead of the 30-60 minutes, I left mine in for 5 hours. I got a very vibrant pink (a little more fuchsia than the pictures on the box).

My one complaint is that this definitely left me with more dye rubbing off than some other brands have. When I used other brands I might wake up the next morning to a streak light on my pillow and that was with lot of hair. Using this on short hair, my pillow looked like a pink paintball fight happened. This and all dyes like it will dye anything and everything they touch. So I highly recommend two things - 1. protect everything (your skin around your face and neck with Vaseline) 2. If possible do NOT rinse your hair in a shower/bathtub. If you have access to a stainless steel sink or some kind of utility / laundry room sink where stains won't matter, that is so much easier to clean.

title: Looks very natural on me
text: I got this wig yesterday and wore it to a family event and some people didn't know it was a wig. The color is about as dark as my hair would be if I dyed it soft black, which I do sometimes. The curls are a little on the POC side (not the curl type/pattern necessarily, but rather the volume at the root) so I found that bobby pinning some bits down in the back or wearing a headband helped it look more natural for a pale jewish girl. The hair is very soft and doesn't irritate me like my synthetic wigs. However, I think they sent me the wrong length, but I'm not upset about it - for a human hair wig that's this versatile (read: can be worn by a white girl) this price is really great and I understand that on their end things might be hectic. I got a bad haircut a week ago and wasn't able to leave my house, was super depressed, crying all the time when i saw a mirror. This wig is a great solution as the semester is starting in one week and I absolutely have to be on campus. It's less hot than other wigs I have, and I feel confident that this looks natural enough to pass as I start meeting new people at my new school. One thing though is that the wig I received is NOT lace front. Since I gave it full bangs, that doesn't really matter, and I don't care that much about that in general because I will make sure to have bangs with any wig, but I thought it would be lace front and it would have been my first so I was disappointed it wasn't. If you're looking for only lace front, skip this one. But overall I'm giving it 5 stars because I really can't imagine the quality for the price being any better than this.

And I liked the color in the photo, too, even though I am a chestnut. But the wig and the hair color are not anywhere near what is advertised. The style is flat in the back, not adorable like it is the profile photo. The color is more strawberry red with ugly flat cream colored highlights: not blond. I tried styling it with the curling iron and it didn't seem to take the curl. But I had the iron on the lowest setting, because I didn't want to burn the wig.

It can't go back, so I'm stuck with it. I'll either donate it to our local theatre group or I'll try cutting it and restyling the cut. I don't think it will hold hair dye because it's synthetic, but I'm going to give it a try when I re-dye my natural hair. What can I lose. I can't wear it anyhow.

title: Love it
text:
This makeup set is gorgeous let alone a great quality. It comes in a soft leather case with straps you rap and tuck to close making it possible for you to add a few extra items in side. It makes the bag a bit more adjustable if you wish to include a mirror, makeup wipes or even a small flat bag with a few makeup items for on the go.

The brushes all have a wooden handle that feels wooden and not plastic or overly painted. The piece in the center that hold the brush to the handle is fermly attached and does not wiggle or feel loose or missed sized at all. The bush brissles themselves and soft and gental on your skin while still being ferm enough to sweep the makeup exactly in the spot you mint for it to go.

Most of the brushes are cut in a tapered cut and only one was blunt excluding the eyebrow brush. There are a few strans on a few of the brushes that needs a quick trimming but this does not cause a problem to do.

The hairs do not shed and fall out even if you were to pull the extra few longer hairs out. I have only seen maybe 4 hairs comeout even after pulling on them to check or while brushing them across my face.

Each brush is packages with a plastic sleave to protect the brushes. this plastic can be tossed out. Some of the brushes has a more thick plastic on the brissles themselves to protect them and these are reusable.

My lipstick brush was damidged when I got it. The harder plastic cap had bent back half the hair and they would not straiten back out. I did call and ask for a return because I really needed this brush. Once I send it out, I do plan to get a second to replace the one I am having to send back. It is a great quality.
Update, I googled a lot of ways to fix your brushes. There had to be a way to fix it. since it was the only flaw in the entire Bset, I had already opened it and even used it before I even noticed the damage brush I wanted to give a shot at not having to return my product. I tried out a few things to fix the bristles. I found that wedding them, wrapping them in tissue then taping it together or just use saran wrap, I left it overnight and the here's were straightened the next day. I really wanted to give this kit a shot because it is such great quality. It was also a great price. I am glad I was able to fix it without having to return it.

title: If You Already Own a Hair Iron, You Don't Want This Brush.
text: I am a sucker for any product that claims to straighten hair.  Against my better judgment, I ordered this product, and sure enough, it doesn't work well.  The metal base heats up quick, but the way the brush is designed, it can't get at the roots of the hair.  So the first 2-3" of the hair shaft remains pouffy while the rest of the hair gets more or less straight.  A hair iron works much more efficiently.  Learn from my mistake, and save your money.  You don't need this product.

title: Pretty, But Totally Magnetic Lashes With No Regular Adhesive
text: FanArti False Eyelashes and Glue Pen Kit,5 Pairs Fake Eyelash & 2 in1 Design Lash Eyeliner (Black+Clear), Easy to Apply and Comfortable,Tweezer Included,All Day Wear come with a glue pen and an eyeliner pen. You have to test the products on your skin first to make certain you have no allergic reactions before using them. I thought the glue pen is just an adhesive and the eyeliner pen, as with all false eyelash eyeliner pens was magnetic, but I was wrong. The glue and eyeliner seem to be both magnetic. You have to wait until both are completely dry before applying the lashes, as the magnetic properties are what keep your lashes on. The 5 pairs of lashes are all very lovely and there is something for every occasion from work to play to dress up. I wish it had been made more clear that these are magnetic lashes, as I only use glue adhesive lashes, and only hypo allergenic glues to protect my eyes. To remove these lashes with the magnetic liner or adhesive on your eyes, you need a good liquid make up remover and cotton pads. For not making the magnetic properties totally clear even though the lashes are lovely, 3 STARS.

title: Puts A Layer Of Silky Smoothness Between You & Your Make-Up
text:

I have combination skin- some parts dry, regular and oily. I also have aging skin, so I really didn't think this primer spray would help me, but it surprisingly did. If anyone knows about aging skin- your make-up shows the fine lines and wrinkles more exaggerated. This primer spray somehow smooths your skin more, leaving it like a smooth slate for make-up. title: Two 5 STAR and Two 4 STAR Fragrances- some are sure to please every man
text:
English Laundry Men's 4 Piece 20ml Coffret is a truly wonderful men's cologne set. You are getting four fragrances- rated 4 and 5 STARS all in one box. The fragrances rated by me are based on my years spent working in a cosmetic factory. I will list each fragrance separately.

ARROGANT- With top notes of bergamot and cedar you get a woodsy freshness to the scent. The middle notes of coriander and lavender bring a warm, clean freshness. At the base are sandalwood, amber and musk bringing a warm, sensual, spicy scent. All together, you get a spicy, warm, woodsy scent with a distinctive freshness to it. This light, sensual scent lasts all day and smells wonderful on almost every man, so 5 STARS.

OXFORD BLEU- The top notes of mint and lemon add a citrus freshness. The middle notes of iris and geranium bring a very light floral scent. The base adds sandalwood and vanilla for a woodsy delicious scent. All together, this scent is light, with an undertone bit of floral and clean citrus and a nice light woodsy smell. This light, woodsy fragrance smells fabulous on almost every man and does last long for 5 STARS.

RIVIERA- With top notes of lemon, bergamot, lime and cedar, you get a refreshing citrus/woods scent. In the middle are jasmine, patchouli, vetiver, lavender and mandarin- most of these were used in the 60's sexy, warm, earthy scents. At the base notes are nutmeg and coumarin to add some spice. This is not for every man, but for a man who likes a more vibrant scent. These scents are very noticeable and not light, being a very woodsy, earthy, warm fragrance with a touch of zest. 4 STARS.

NOTTING HILL- The top notes begin with bergamot, lemon and lime for a clean, natural scent. Then the middle notes have bolder peppercorn and jasmine bringing a rose/herbal scent. At the bottom are cedarwood, sandalwood, amber and a powdery musk for a very potent woodsy, animal musky scent. This is definitely not for every man being very heavy scents. There is nothing light about this fragrance. 4 STARS.

With four interesting fragrances, two being light and two being heavy, every man is sure to find one he will like. Lighter scents always smell wonderful on almost every man and the bolder scents smell great on a man depending on how his chemistry goes with the bolder fragrances. 4 ½ STARS.

title: Instantly Removes Puffiness, But It's The Firmness & Tightness You Will Love
text:
LaClaire Eye Firming Serum with Caffeine, Peptides, Botanicals - Best Treatment for Puffy Eyes, Wrinkles, Fine Lines (5 ml/0.5 oz) gave me immediate results in reducing puffiness from not sleeping well. I don't always get a good night's sleep and in the morning, the puffiness shows and sometimes dark circles accompany the puffiness.

This Eye Firming Serum works unbelievably fast. The puffiness goes away within an hour. As for dark circles, they do fade out with daily use- you will notice a difference within a week. The main thing I noticed is a tighter, firmer feel of my under eye area. This tightening and firming of the delicate eye area actually does make fine lines disappear. Age spots don't disappear, but your skin will brighten up.

This Eye Firming Serum is so easy to use. You simply apply a drop or two with the dropper and lightly dab into your skin with a finger. If you do this at night, you will wake up to a firmer skin and it looks brighter, but it's the feeling of firmness and tightness you will love. Applying a good moisturizer after the Eye Serum really makes your under eye skin look fabulous and feeling hydrated. Keeping the dropper clean after use will result in always having the serum perfect and moist with no dried out particles. Any Eye Serum that can immediately get rid of puffiness from a bad night's sleep and leave your skin around your eyes feeling firmer and tighter gets 5 STARS from me.

title: Refrigerate For Maximum, Instant Relief
text:
This Vaginal Moisturizer - Vulva Balm - USDA Organic Aloe Free & Natural Vaginal Cream - Intimate Skin Cream - Reduce Vaginal Dryness, Itching & Burning - Estrogen Free Treatment - V. Harmony (1) will relieve a multitude of irritations caused by many different issues. One of the main irritations are pads or tampons. Every month, especially for a heavy period, menstrual pads can cause painful irritations, dryness, rashes, pain and itching. Then when you are into menopause, the irritations, dryness, rashes, pain and itching are a hundred times worse, due to heavy periods that can last forever.

There are many other issues that can cause constant irritations besides pads and tampons- if you've ever had a bad Urinary Tract Infection, where you are urinating frequently in pain, the rashes are unbearable. Having a weak bladder at times where you need a heavier pad or diaper causes more unpleasant rashes. It is so difficult to find a cream that will actually help with severe chafing, dryness, pain, itching and irritations. This V. Harmony Vaginal Moisturizer helps immensely with chafing and dryness. But when it comes to helping with severe rashes, itching and pain- make sure you refrigerate this first before applying, because you will be happy you did. Applying this cold is the best relief ever- the pain goes away immediately. Take the time to refrigerate the jar for maximum, instant relief! 5 STARS.

title: Made my skin raw and didn't remove make up
text: These don't feel at all like microfiber cloths, more like really soft, thin, fuzzy blankets. You're supposed to wash them in the laundry machine, then after they dry you wet them before you use them so they can work. I wear a lot of liquid lipsticks, mascara, brow pomade, and other products that can be difficult to remove. I've never used the on-brand version of this makeup remover towel, so I can't compare. I followed all the instructions, and these just plain didn't work. It made my skin feel raw from rubbing, but somehow it grabbed none of the makeup from my face, except it smeared my foundation around. I'm very disappointed with these towels. They do not work gently, they do not remove even the most basic makeup (foundation) without a ton of painful rubbing. I do not recommend using these.

title: Perfect for Quick Drama
text:
These lashes are VERY dramatic. I saw a few negative reviews stating that they were too much but the description and photos give accurate measurements so it was no surprise to me. They're pretty easy to put on and they came packaged perfectly. SO

Pros
Easy to apply
Easy to remove
Drama without much hassle

Cons
Heavy
Don't fit my eyelid quite right and are difficult to trim off excess

TIPS
Apply your regular eyeliner first. If you use this eyeliner, it runs a bit and your lashes may not stick where they should. Do your regular liner design and then shake up the magnetic eyeliner and apply it where the lashes need to go. Apply, let dry, then apply again before putting the lashes on. Do NOT remove them to show anyone how easy it is, they pull the liner right off and won't go back on (yes I did this lmao)

So, 5 star rating from me regardless of the cons. They're so fluffy and soft, and I expected magnets on my eyelids to be just a little heavy

title: Great Bundles! Great Hair!
text:
[[VIDEOID:960b84058924153a7db27c4cc6448444]] I received three bundles from the company to install and wear (18"/20"/22" straight hair weave bundles). The bundles arrived earlier than expected and I was pleased with the quality of the hair. I even got a nice pair of lashes with the hair.

The hair itself was soft and the texture was nice and full. My stylist also said that she liked the hair as well and that the hair was soft and very pretty! I chose the quick weave method this time during my installation instead of sew-in. Women do however think it's my own hair because how well my stylist lays the tracks so close to each other. It's light and not heavy and looks quite natural!

I've purchased several hair bundles from this company over the past years and the quality of hair I've received has been pretty consistent. The hair looks so natural and the compliments I receive when I use this hair are endless!
Try the hair yourself; the bundles are a great price in comparison to other companies and you'll look great wearing them!

title: Good sponge, so-so cleanser

The cleanser on the other hand isn't a favorite of mine. It does not have an inner seal and the smell is just meh. I don't know how another reviewer got a citrus smell since the ingredients don't include fragrance. I think the cleanser is a little too harsh and drying for my skin, it might be better for people with very oily skin.

title: Good, cute hairband for washing face
text:
I bought this for my sister to keep her hair out of her face when she washes her face. It's a cute headband and works very well. One thing to note is that when you first see it, the unstretched circumference is quite small. No worries though, it fits on my sister's head and she has a big head. It's a good, snug fit so the headband doesn't move around and no hair gets loose.

Another thing I liked is that it's double wrapped, so the head band is clean and free of dust. I've also been able to machine wash it to clean it so that's a plus too.

text: This product is amazing! I am almost 50 years of age, so my skin has hormonal fluctuations as one might expect.  I do my best to stick to a regimented beauty routine, however due to my schedule - it is sometimes difficult because I travel so much of my time.  This product leaves my skin supple and extremely soft.  I appreciate the fact that it contains  Vitamin C and CoQ10 which my online research states is really goof for your skin.  This product provided a lot of hydration for my face.  I am certainly looking forward to using it this summer as I live in Florida (The Sunshine State) so I have to take extra care from the sun.  I used it primarily at night prior to going to bed. I followed the recommended directions for use and only applied a very thin layer all over my face and neck.  I left the product on my face for 15 minutes and removed it with a damp wash cloth.  The product came off of my face right away and didn't leave any residue.  I really liked this product. title: Leaves Hair in Snarls!
text: This stuff is a joke.  I have shoulder length hair that I color.  Did not moisturize my hair at all.  Conditioner not only left my hair in snarls with no detangling ability, it made my wavy hair fall flat and go pin straight!  There is not any body to it!  I use other products with coconut oil and/or extract that keep my waves intact while boosting the body of my hair.  Product reviews need give particulars about the reactive process of the product along with including the  type of hair, if color processed and if they air dry or blow dry.  "Works great" does not tell the person reading the review anything about how or why the product worked for that person.  However, it does mislead the rest of us into thinking a product will work for anyone.  The review process needs to be changed to include proper descriptions of the customer's reasoning behind their review.  Now I threw away money for  this rotten  shampoo and conditioner from Renpure!

title: Turbo trimer!
text:
The good the bad and the ugly. Here goes. I've always sworn by Norelco trimmers. I've owned several. They normally last reasonably well. I normally get 5 years of use out of them. I say reasonably well because in this day and age, 5 years is good but I prefer things to last 20 years like they used too. Sadly; that's not going to happen. The adjustable guide is the best design that I have found. Far better than similar units that use multiple guides that can get lost, damaged and require additional storage space. The turbo function does work, it has enough high power that calling it "turbo" is not only cool but accurate. The charge/low battery lights function well. The vacuum functions well. I've tried other manufactures so called vacuum units and found that not only did they not work they were a total disappointment. This vacuum system works! Removing and installing the guide was a bit tricky at first but you get used to it. The single thing that I miss is the slide up mini trimmer. Frankly; I would rather have that than the vacuum. Still, I like this product and recommend it! I have had it about a year now and it still works perfect!

Update: 3 years old and like new!

title: Great little device!
text: I love this machine, have 3 of them.  Take easy, proceed gradually!  Remember to replace the blades when they become dull. Edit: to Cindy: the powder from your callous builds up in a cup under the rotary n u have to easily take apart each time n blow it out or shake it, etc. I purchase 1 more when the came down in price. I love these things, much more than Amope. That's sand paper roll going around but these have such a good blade u have to use it responsibly or u can cut your feet, but so effective!!! If used properly!!!!  Go slow as some people have mentioned n be persistent. A couple times a week go over your feet for a few minutes. My feet were like that gentlemen's. I too was on my feet up to 16 hours a day. My feet cracked n bleed. The best moisturizer on market right now i think is Curel Hydratherapy. I have asked Derms at work n they usually say Curel. Vanicream is excellent but I find it too greasy. After using this device hydrate your feet n place cotton stockings on. Do this at bedtime too if it's really bad. I love this product, im sorry if some of u have had mechanical problems. I've used 4 of mine n I had one problem w the wire getting broken inside. I called the company n they sent out a new wire immediately. My feet are silky smooth!!  What a mess they were 15 years ago!!!!  TO JOE:  are u reviewing the correct product?  I have 4 of these because I loved them so much n never wanted to be without n u r describing this device incorrectly.  You do no charge this unit. It comes with an electrical cord like an iron n that provides electricity/power. There is no charging. I've had the 1st models n the last for sale models n I think I r reviewing a different device. Another edit!  The customer who said this isn't supposed to be an electric sander is correct.  Yes, it stops if too much pressure, it's suppose to. Another customer said the blade was not rough enuf. Yes, eventually u will need to replace blades, but metal against skin should last quite awhile. I bought several blades when they came down in price. The customers that don't like it seem to be using it incorrectly from the start n misunderstanding the mechanics of it.  It's really great n sad Amazon is not selling it right now.  I have gotten so many people on this device!!!!

title: TSA-approved clear quart bag - sturdy and surprisingly roomy!
text:
This clear bag quart bag is terrific for travel, and is surprisingly roomy and sturdy! My family used these during a recent trip to Europe - they zip open and closed easily, are made of heavy plastic, and the gusset design allows one to fit a large amount of travel-sized bottles! Much better than a zip-lock sandwich bag. Highly recommend, especially for anyone who wants to use only carry-on luggage instead of checking their bags.

Liquid prescription/OTC medications and other prescription items, such as contact lenses (and lens solution) are generally exempt from the TSA's 3-1-1 liquids rule for liquids, gels, aerosols, creams and pastes (3.4 oz bottle or less; 1 quart-sized, clear, plastic, zip-top bag; 1 bag per passenger), and can be packed in a separate bag; you just have to pull them out for inspection with your quart-sized bag. Check the TSA's website for more information.

title: Nice salon-quality cuticle pusher with nail cleaner tool, with a minor caveat.
text:
I have been looking for a stainless steel cuticle pusher to use for home manicures - this one is nearly identical to the one used by my manicurist, it has a nice weight to it, is comfortable to use, and is salon-quality. I use it with the CND CuticleAway Cuticle Remover gel, and it works just as expected. The nail cleaner end is a nice touch - I prefer this style to the ones that have flat or split trimmer blade ends.

One caveat - the edge on the pusher end is sharp - you need to be careful of the pressure and angle used which pushing your cuticles back, as holding the tool at the wrong angle and/or using too much pressure may result in damage to the top layer of your nail (e.g. the tool may shave a slight bit off). I used my Dremel with a fine sanding bit to dull the edge on the pusher end; this resolved the issue for me. If you don't have a Dremel, I suggest taking an emery board to smooth the sharp end before use in order to avoid damaging your nail.

I paid FULL price for this cuticle pusher, and did not receive any incentives or discounts in exchange for this review.

title: 12 New 5.5ml (3/16oz) Empty Lip Balm Containers In Blue
text: These empty lip balm containers work really nice. It is refreshing to have different colors to choose from, other than plain white, clear or black. The plastic that makes up these lip balm containers can handle a hotter liquid with no problems and the plastic is BPA free. The caps are not loose and they snap on tightly. These lip balm containers worked great when I added a softer lip balm and a harder lip balm. I was able make the lip balm go all the way up and down with no problems. Since they work really good with both softer and harder lip balms, I will definitely order these again. I depend on reviews myself when I order products and will only write an honest review with the knowledge that I have about a product. I receive this product for a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

title: Tie dye velvet head band that is bright and colorful
text:
I bought this headband to attend a 1960's party.
The velvet tie dye material is very bright, pretty, and retro.
The material covers a plastic headband. The plastic has little give or stretch so it was bothersome on my head after a few hours of wearing.

title: If you have facial redness like I do, this product is fabulous.
text: I have bought a ton of these over the years.  I have a lot of pink/red tone to my skin and I'm not a fan of all that so I need to tone it down.  You don't have to use a lot either so it lasts.  And no, you aren't going to look like a green monster.  Blends well.
